attributes.action: Allow holidays for all faiths, recognised or not.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All workers are given christian holidays regardless of their religious beliefs which I believe is ignorance and we should have the right - with so many races, beliefs etc. - within the UK to state our religion and have the appropriate holidays. We need to show in this day and age this is unacceptable.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
